actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Conservation Credit and Rural Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, and Rural Development

official_title: A bill to revise the program under the Farmland Protection Policy Act with respect to the conversion of farmland to nonagricultural uses.

summary.text: Amends the Farmland Protection Policy Act to: (1) permit the chief executive officer of a State (currently the Governor) to bring an action in Federal district court to challenge a proposed Federal program which would convert farmland to nonagricultural use; (2) permit such an action in a State with a local or State farmland protection policy or program (currently limited to State policy or program); and (3) limit the Department of Defense exemption to war or national emergency.

titles.title: A bill to revise the program under the Farmland Protection Policy Act with respect to the conversion of farmland to nonagricultural uses.
